comment:
As sad and uncomfortable as it is, this is exactly why it‚Äôs not fair to treat someone as a ‚Äúvictim‚Äù just because they say so. We can believe their victimhood, but we should never treat the accused as guilty. It‚Äôs so hard to prove your innocence when someone falsely accuses you, and that is the same argument alleged victims use: ‚Äúhow can I have prove it? It happened years ago, and all I have is my testimony. You‚Äôre ought to believe me no matter what‚Äù. Well, Amber just showed us that even ‚Äúproof‚Äù can be deceiving. 

It‚Äôs only fair to treat the accuser as alleged victim, because the accused cannot be guilty until proven.
